name: SimonU's Nplay for Apple
description: This style is for solving the mobile issues when trying to browse Nplay.  You should read the instructions on BB before attempting to use the stylesheet for a mobile device.
additional_info: Some devices such as an Android might not have the apps needed to use this stylesheet. I recommend using an Apple device since I am only testing it on an iPad and a PC.  There might be some issues with iPhones and iTouches.
